abstracts.cdata!:
As already mentioned, the first stage of
            Guri with its three units is nearing completion. The project
            now proposed for Bank financing would include civil works to
            extend the powerhouse to ten units, and the installation of
            unit 4 complete and of embedded parts for units 5 to 10. It
            would also provide for consulting services for engineering
            and supervision during procurement and construction. The
            basic powerhouse construction would be completed during
            1969-72. Unit 4, the first in the expansion program, would
            come into service in 1973; the remaining six units would be
            erected one each year commencing in 1975. The resulting
            power capacity would meet the market forcast for Guri
            through 1980.
